cast.overview: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.
cast.title: The Big Sick

details.biography: Susham Bedi is an Indian novelist and writer of short stories and poetry, as well as an occasional film and television actress. She was a professor of Hindi Language and Literature at the Department of Middle Eastern and Asian Languages and Cultures (MEALAC) at Columbia University, New York, USA.
details.name: Susham Bedi
